actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To provide that certain limitations on the payment of unemployment compensation to former members of the armed forces shall not apply to individuals involuntarily discharged or released from the armed forces.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to certain limitations on the payment of unemployment compensation to former members of the armed forces to make such limitations inapplicable to individuals who were discharged or released under involuntary conditions, including not being accepted for an additional term of enlistment for which the individual volunteered.

titles.title: To provide that certain limitations on the payment of unemployment compensation to former members of the armed forces shall not apply to individuals involuntarily discharged or released from the armed forces.
